UserId.description: Indentity number(primary key) for user object. Generated in DB table when inserting a record.

AccountNumber.description: Account number of the user.It can be any stakeholder of the application.even can be a gym.

GymNumber.description: If this user is a gym, then the gym number.

ExternalEntityNumber.description: Entity number that make a relationship with BOX API DB.

Number.description: Unique number maintain by application to idenify user.

IntroduceBy.description: If Someone introduced this user to the system, then that user's UserId.

Guardian.description: Gaurdian of the this user if he/she is under 18 years old.
